582.content:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="Categories" nav_menu="91"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="My Account" nav_menu="49"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_wp_custommenu title="Pages" nav_menu="50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text]

About

We’re a fashion/apparel/sports store for the whole family! We have all subjects for outdoor activities - from the most basic sporting goods to the last generation technological equipment. It also plays an important role that we have an online store. Now, no matter where you live – our products are always there, turning on the computer will be enough! A high-quality goods with a reasonable price – in such a way you can describe our approach to the formation of commodity policy that we are implementing for recent years. We carefully select suppliers, sifting unreasonably expensive, and supporting those who share our views. Consultants prompt the optimal solution for each client, based on its needs and the level of sports training. Customer’s interests have always been for us on the first place. For regular customers we have a system of privileges. In addition, participants of special programs regularly receive special offers and discounts on services.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

584.title: About
584.content:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486430152307{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8"][vc_column_text]

Economize on a healthy way of life is no longer necessary: sport is now truly available to anyone!

Sport is not only the will, the strength, the desire. It is also the right equipment; and it’s in front of you. Nowadays to buy soundly sports shoes and sportswear is not so simple: besides the veneer of consumer goods hides a dubious quality. That’s why our mission is developing a successful and efficient business by offering customers the best range of quality products for sports and leisure activities, while maintaining the highest level of service.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" bg_type="image" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_new="id^2277|url^http://wowmall.tonytemplates.com/organic-cosmetics/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/CLAPR780b_46161131.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^CLAPR780b_46161131|description^null" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_img_attach="fixed" css=".vc_custom_1490175957817{padding-top: 400px !important;padding-bottom: 453px !important;}"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1490176111486{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #84b544 !important;}" el_class="dark-row"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1486430569147{padding-bottom: 17px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Interesting Facts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="What do experts say?" list_icon="myfont-t-shirt" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;" desc_font_color="#ffffff"]The effectiveness of training, according to many experts, is directly dependent on the quality sportswear. You can wear designer suits, brag about their high-quality embroidered logo on the t-shirt or wear a stylish and tight synthetics. But what is it all if you're in a sports suit that is not comfortable?[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="Coco Chanel – a legislator of sports fashion." list_icon="myfont-thumbs-up" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;" desc_font_color="#ffffff"]One of the fiercest advocates of comfortable clothing for women was Coco Chanel, began to create a ladies' suits from jersey, and stated that a woman can wear pants, comfortable shoes, to borrow the model of the male wardrobe, swim at the beach in the open bathing suit, sunbathing, outdoor recreation and exercise.[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][info_list position="top" icon_bg_color="" icon_color="" font_size_icon="76" connector_color="rgba(51,51,51,0.01)" el_class="icon-top-left"][info_list_item list_title="What is the benefit to run in our sportswear?" list_icon="myfont-megaphone" desc_font_size="desktop:18px;" desc_font_line_height="desktop:26px;" title_font_size="desktop:26px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:37px;" desc_font_color="#ffffff"]Training in the cold season well tempers the body, increases immunity, improves your health. Against the background of short days in winter running charges the body with vigor, while running produced hormones of joy. In addition, it increases self-control and self-esteem.[/info_list_item][/info_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1486430997512{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1486430959022{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]
